name: Board Knight: Embark Wooden Warrior!
description: A dark storm looms over Heartwood. What mysteries does it bear?   The Tree of Life fears it may   be the reawakening of   the   Forces of Death! After being created only a day before disaster, it is      up to Board Knight the forces of Death and save Heartwood!   Luckily, Board Knight is not alone against the Demonic Forces, but will    Board Knight and his friends be enough    to save Heartwood from a certain demise?   Find out in this action-packed   Zelda-like RPG!
